thread.title: United Still Working on Next Step After CEO Illness
thread.title_full: United Still Working on Next Step After CEO Illness - WSJ

author: George Stahl
title: United Still Working on Next Step After CEO Illness
text:
United Continental Holdings Inc. said it would release more details about the companyâ€™s next administrative step later Monday or Tuesday, in light of the hospitalization of Chief Executive Oscar Munoz.
Mr. Munoz was hospitalized last week after suffering a heart attack, people familiar with the matter said. The 56-year-old has been spearheading a major turnaround effort at the No. 2 U.S. airline by traffic. He suffered his attack... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
